did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The photograph of Charles Bratton was taken by the Hoge–Berkeley Studio in Staunton, Virginia.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Charles Bratton Photograph must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Charles Bratton Photograph, Ms2009-102, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Charles Bratton Photograph was donated to Special Collections in 2002.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Charles Bratton Photograph commenced and was completed in June 2009.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Charles Bratton married Nancy Pearl Barlow on April 9, 1925. No other biographical information is available.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: While this photograph is marked with a "Hoge–Berkeley Studio (Staunton, Virginia)" label, there is no other identification. Charles Bratton is pictured in uniform.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by material type.
